storyInfo: One thing comes after another. Seeing how desperate the situation is, Sharp acts to rescue the Doctor. The Doctor opts to turn back, and together with Aurora, relates to the people what pros and cons are at play, temporarily allaying the conflict.

attributes.content: Status report.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Things aren't quite right. The Doctor's guess was a hit; a lot of people are gathered over here.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Are they setting out for the factories?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Yes... I'm sure of it.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Stay on their tails. Keep me informed.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: And that'll conclude this factory's handover.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Everything up till now has been as smooth as ice, thanks to your mediation, Doctor.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: I might have been a little neglectful beforehand. I'm very sorry for that.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.options: Don't mind it, I'm just a scholar.

attributes.content: My, no need to be so humble. There's plenty still to come that'll require your guidance.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: One moment.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Er, do you have some qualm about this, General Valais?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: An ambush.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: That's General Valais for you.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: We're here to get an explanation.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Weiss and the Doctor should have just conveyed to the subjects' representatives the steps Karlan Trade's taking.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: There must have been some misunderstanding...
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Sorry, Mr. Chester, I think you don't get it.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes was tricked by this foreigner!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.options: Come again?

attributes.content: We were all kept in the dark. We only realized what was happening once someone told us.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Mr. Chester, you should know this foreigner's 'original' purpose in Kjerag was to advise on Oripathy and Infected handling methods.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: What's your point?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Our informant is never wrong.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: This foreigner's already in cahoots with Arctosz, and it's your job to keep eyes on the 'guest', General Valais.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Everyone knows Arctosz and the Vine-Bear Court were never happy with how Sir Enciodes opened up Kjerag.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: The foreigner's going to say the factories spread Oripathy as an excuse to shut them forever with gross slander against the lord!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: You're the one speaking slander! The Paleroches would never stoop to such unsightly lows!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: The Paleroches and the Vine-Bear Court are all tied up! You don't think anything 'unsightly?' You don't think enough people have lost their lives?!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Father, Father! Are you alright?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Come, drink it. Drink and all will be better.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Kjeragandr's tears will cleanse this taint the Tschäggättä have left.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: What proof do you have?!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Pah! You're asking me to prove your own misdeeds?
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Doctor, this...
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.options: Isn't true.;......;What do you think?

attributes.content: Can I trust you?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: What, hound got your tongue?
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Don't think you can smooth-talk your way out of this!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: There's only one thing you need to say! Justify yourself to us!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Guards! Protect our guest! Take them away!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Get that foreigner now!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Wh-Where did you come from?!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: It's not safe here!
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Time to run, Doctor!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The Ursus operator lifts you onto her shoulders, and leaps into the forest in giant bounds.

attributes.options: Um, you can stop running. Let's put me down.

attributes.content: Oh! Alright.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: *Pant*...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I need to reiterate, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: No matter what plans you have, this is far too dangerous. You probably don't remember, but I've told you the same thing many, many times before.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: Believe me, I believe you.

attributes.content: Anyone can make mistakes, even me. If you're willing, I hope you can make my work a bit easier on me.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The possibility's not high, but what would you have done if more professional combatants were snuck into that attack?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: If they brought crossbows, what then?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: Don't worry, their goal isn't to kill me.

attributes.content: I'll report the situation to the Doctor.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Captain Sharp and I both followed your confidant's message, heading separately to the Browntails' residence and the Silverashes' factories to pursue suspicious personnel.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Our trails ended up converging into one, surprisingly enough...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: These people were very likely incited by the Browntails.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Agitating civilians and smearing the competition are both common schemes, but they're crude.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.options: Seems it's to stir conflict between me and the Silverashes.;Seems it's to stir conflict between the Paleroches and Silverashes.
But it's also probably a trap.

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Their equipment and combat strength aren't up to par. It's not even enough to get them out in one piece.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Suppose they were arrested and interrogated, and they gave up their source...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Then it would look bad for the Browntails?!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.options: That's not the whole of it.

attributes.content: We're lacking intel. We still can't see the full picture of this incident. No way to actually lock onto the hidden orchestrator or their goals.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The one thing we can be sure of is someone wants to disturb the tri-clan relations. That is to say, they want to shatter the Snow Realm's overall stability. Circumstances are exceptionally dangerous for outsiders like you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: What do we do now, Doctor? Should we think of some way to make it back first?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.options: It's not time yet. This incident's far from over.

attributes.content: That's right, this charade's just one small part of the giant storm. But my duty's clear-cut—I'm getting you out of danger, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: I'm going to get more info.;I'm going to evade capture.;I'm going to stop whoever's stirring up the clans.

attributes.content: The more you know, the more dangerous your situation. We likely won't have the time to ensure all the details, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: That might just be the start of it, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I have to remind you, Doctor, this may have long grown beyond your plans.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: But since you're so determined, and seeing as you have a good grasp on things... we won't stop you.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: At this point, do you plan on telling Courier and Matterhorn, and especially Cliffheart, considering they're all Silverashes?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: No.;......;Up to you.

attributes.content: Agreed. I'm sorry to Cliffheart, but now that we're here, it's hard for me to fully trust Courier and Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Doctor, I know you want to trust them, but set aside Cliffheart for now—it's hard for me not to be wary of Courier and Matterhorn in this current tri-clan dispute, no matter what.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Then I choose to keep part of the truth hidden from them.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: For now, take me back.

attributes.content: Is there anyone else?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: None, they've all been suppressed.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Then what about the Doctor? Whereabouts?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: We... saw someone taking the Doctor away, running into the forest.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Damn...!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: You lot, with me! There'd better not be a single scratch on—
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: Is it me you're looking for?

attributes.content: Ah! So you're... I thought you...
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.options: You thought I ran?

attributes.content: That was a difficult situation there, and I lost sight of you. I hope you can forgive me.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I made a mockery of myself, when I should by all rights have prioritized your safety.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: As you can see... the people here have all been contained.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Don't move! Settle down!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Don't think we don't know! You're here just to frame Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: You self-righteous hypocrite! Pah!
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: ...Bro?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Lara? Why are you here?
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Bro! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Wh—Why are you all mixed up with these people?
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: That's my boss!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Leave it. Now's not the time.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Understood, Captain.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.options: To be honest, I have nitpicks with Karlan Trade's factory safety measures.

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: The exhaust pipes are too close to the construction area. The layout's pure nonsense.;The protective gear given to workers is too low-coverage.;The Originium transport channels aren't secure enough.

attributes.content: Have... you told Sir Enciodes about that?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: You! You! You're a nasty piece of work after all.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.options: It's the truth.

attributes.content: I don't quite understand, so I have no way to judge if what you say is true.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: But it sounds at least somewhat reasonable.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I'll never believe your vile lies! You! You...
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: I want you to behave or else! Have you given a thought to the sort of punishment you'll face for attacking an outside guest of honor in the Vine-Bear Court's territory?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: So long as it's for Sir Enciodes...
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: The Silverashes' guest attacked by the Silverashes' subjects? Is there any way this won't smear the Silverash reputation?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Is this how you 'repay Sir Enciodes?'
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: ...That...
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Think about it!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Bro, you used to be so cool-headed. What happened?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: ...Forget it. You wouldn't understand if I told you.
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.options: General Valais. Let these people go.

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: As you see, my subordinate has a relative here.;This is a misunderstanding. Don't make it any bigger.;Consider it compensation for your mistake there.

attributes.content: General Valais, please be kind...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Is that really all it is? I'm not convinced.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You know what, forget it.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: ...Are you sure this settles it?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Listen up, all of you. If it wasn't for our guest's altruism, you'd all be in for a caning before the day is out! Reflect on your actions!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Don't think you'll buy us off just like that! You rotten...
attributes.name: Armed Subject

attributes.content: Leave it, leave it. We're out of here. Don't disgrace the Silverashes any more than that.
attributes.name: Soldier Leader

attributes.content: The furious subjects slowly leave, wearing expressions of disappointment and spite as they go. The most vitriolic clash, for the moment, has been defused.
A heavy blizzard is gathering at this moment, of that much you're sure.
